lead.label: New Lead (legacy)
lead.help_text: Triggers when a new lead is added.

query.label: Query
query.help_text: You can select a saved search from Close.io, or type a custom search query in based on Close.io [search syntax](https://help.close.io/customer/portal/articles/1564202-search-syntax).  All searches will be modified to include 'sort:-created' to allow Zapier deduplication to work.

opportunity.label: New Opportunity
opportunity.help_text: Triggers when a new opportunity is added.

user_id.label: Assigned To User
user_id.help_text: Select a user, and only trigger on opportunities assigned to that user.

value_period.label: Value Period
value_period.help_text: Return only one time, monthly, or annual opportunities.

status_label.label: Status (label)
status_label.help_text: e.g.: Potential, Customer, Bad Fit.  **Only use if you have not selected a status above.**

status_type.label: Status Type
status_type.help_text: Always one of: "active", "won", or "lost". Each status in Close.io has a status "type".  **Only use if you have not selected a status above.**

task.label: New Task
task.help_text: Triggers when a new task is created.
task.hook_static_directions: Log into your service and paste the below URL into the webhook setup field.
